verses.verse: Then Yonah <WH3124> prayed <WH6419> <WH8691> unto the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430> out of the fish's <WH1710> belly <WH4578>,

And said <WH559> <WH8799>, I cried <WH7121> <WH8804> by reason of mine affliction <WH6869> unto the YY <WH3068>, and he heard <WH6030> <WH8799> me; out of the belly <WH990> of SH'ol <WH7585> cried <WH7768> <WH8765> I, and thou heardest <WH8085> <WH8804> my voice <WH6963>.

For thou hadst cast <WH7993> <WH8686> me into the deep <WH4688>, in the midst <WH3824> of the seas <WH3220>; and the floods <WH5104> compassed <WH5437> <WH8779> me about: all thy billows <WH4867> and thy waves <WH1530> passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> me.
Then I said <WH559> <WH8804>, I am cast out <WH1644> <WH8738> of thy sight <WH5869>; yet I will look <WH5027> <WH8687> again <WH3254> <WH8686> toward thy holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>.

The waters <WH4325> compassed me about <WH661> <WH8804>, even to the soul <WH5315>: the depth <WH8415> closed me round about <WH5437> <WH8779>, the weeds <WH5488> were wrapped about <WH2280> <WH8803> my head <WH7218>.

I went down <WH3381> <WH8804> to the bottoms <WH7095> of the mountains <WH2022>; the earth <WH776> with her bars <WH1280> was about me for ever <WH5769>: yet hast thou brought up <WH5927> <WH8686> my life <WH2416> from corruption <WH7845>, O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>.

When my soul <WH5315> fainted <WH5848> <WH8692> within me I remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>: and my prayer <WH8605> came in <WH935> <WH8799> unto thee, into thine holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>.
They that observe <WH8104> <WH8764> lying <WH7723> vanities <WH1892> forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> their own mercy <WH2617>.

But I will sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> unto thee with the voice <WH6963> of thanksgiving <WH8426>; I will pay <WH7999> <WH8762> that that I have vowed <WH5087> <WH8804>. Salvation <WH3444> is of the YY <WH3068>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto the fish <WH1709>, and it vomited out <WH6958> <WH8686> Yonah <WH3124> upon the dry <WH3004> land.
